body:
@joel-costigliola By now I just replaced every occurance in the CompletableFutureAssert tests, as well as replaced and refactored all LocalDateAssert and all InstantAssert tests to follow the current test guidelines. I still have to do all LocalDateTimeAssert, LocalTimeAssert and OffsetDateTimeAssert tests and I already have around 30 changed files.
Since big PRs aren't much fun, would you like the changes in batches or in one big bulk?
Good idea, let's split the PR in per type, I'll look into this one first and then you can tackle another assert class tests

issue.title: #1611: rewrite CompletableFutureAssert test classes to use assertThatAssertionErrorIsThrownBy

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM
